**Zendesk For WHMCS** will change your daily struggles with customer tickets and entire support. And of course will change them for the better!

Owing to our product your customers will be able to use a complex support system solution without even leaving your WHMCS. Module will let you to manage tickets and the entire support aspects directly from your Zendesk. This will significantly improve the comfort of your work and the satisfaction of your customers.


**Features:**

- Clientarea Integration
- Complete Zendesk Tickets Management From Clientarea
- File Attachments
- Single Sign On (SSO) Integration
- Listing Tickets On The Home Page
- Autochanging Of Emails In Zendesk, When Changed In The WHMCS
- Possibility To Create And Set Up Custom Templates


**Additionally:**

- **Multi-Language Support**
- Supports WHMCS Version 5 and Later
